name: Planet Dream (H-Man2000)
description:
Discover a mysterious world, platforming, exploring, and collecting sparks to ultimately wake up.

Controls:

Left/Right or A/D: run

Up or W: jump

Space: grapple

Down or S: crouch/spin dive

Left/Right or A/D and Space: air dash

Right click: read/talk

This is a project created for my independent study this semester.  Feedback is appreciated.
